Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization where the objective function or constraints are nonlinear.
Example: Design of engineering systems with nonlinear dynamics

Name: Integer Programming
Solvability: but some or all variables must take integer values.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Combines LP with integer restrictions on some variables.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Minimizing a convex objective over a convex set; includes LP
Appearances: Polynomial time if structure is known

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Objective function is quadratic; constraints are linear.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Decomposes multistage decision problems into recursive subproblems.

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization under uncertainty using probabilistic constraints or objectives.

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimizes against worst-case uncertainty within bounded sets.
